headline: Edison International Raises Common Stock Dividend 6.1%; 21st Consecutive Annual Increase
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., December 12, 2024--Edison International (NYSE: EIX) today declared a quarterly common stock dividend of $0.8275 per share, payable on Jan. 31, 2025, to shareholders of record on Jan. 7, 2025. This action increases the annual dividend rate by $0.19 per share for the quarter ending Jan. 31, 2025. The 2025 annual dividend rate will be $3.31 per share, an increase of 6.1% from the current annual dividend rate of $3.12 per share.

headline: NextEra Energy: Both Halves Of The Company Face Risk In New Florida Regulations
summary: NextEra Energy and NextEra Energy Partners are effectively one company, despite their separate tickers. Find out why I remain neutral on NEE and NEP stocks.
